description: This table contains information on suspended medications on discharge. The status of the resumed order, reason for discontinuing or resuming the medication, along with the unique ID of the order is stored.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: MED_RESUME_ORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order that is resumed or discontinued on discharge.

columns.name: MED_RESUME_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the suspended medication that is resumed on discharge.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Default Action (Determined by configuration)


Will not be resumed


Resumed (Default)


Auto-Discontinued


Will be resumed


Modified


New


No Change (pending)


No Change
